metadata.title: CVE-2024-35799 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Prevent crash when disable stream [Why] Disabling streamencoder invokes a function that no longer exists. [How] Check if thefunction declaration is NULL in disable stream encoder.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
